init.description:
Update the host if the heat pump IP changed, and choose whether to append the hub label to entity IDs. Need help? See https://github.com/MattieGit/qube_heatpump/wiki.

Enable "Add hub label" to append the hub label such as "qube1" to entity IDs so they are easier to recognise when multiple heat pumps are configured. This is not recommended for single heat pump installs.
